Summary: 2 UFOs observed. One sped off, the other seemed to wait for me to approach in car.
divs: sighting detailsi was 15 years old, it was a summer night about 8:30pm when my mother asked me to go to the store and pick up a wedding\shower present. the store was to close at 9:00pm. this is a small town, so no other traffic on the road, i had all the car windows down and no radio on. i came around a slight right turn that was slightly higher elevation than the road ahead that was straightfor about 3 miles. i noticed 2 groups of lights on my left at about eye level - 2 green and 1 red. they appeared to be crossing the road slowly at a shallow oblique angle. i set my speed to be below the point where i guestimated they would cross the road. then 1 set of lights sped up and disappeared quickly to my right while the other set seemed to hover. as i approached, the lights "floated" across the road above me at barely above the telephone poles. i pulled off the road and leaned out of the car to get a better look aboe me. it was a large, circular shape dark against the night sky with the lighs clustered in the middle. it floated with no sound like a leaf back in the direction i had come from, then it reversed back to it's original path and disappeared quickly over the mountains with no sound and no apparent acceleration. even at that age i had an interest in unusual things and was a star gazer from an early age. at this point in history, there were a lot of ufo reports in the north georgia area. i feel even at that age i was an objective observer.
